Resources

AACAP- American Academy of Child and Adolescent Psychiatry

AACAP facts for families – Concise, evidence-based information on mental illness and medications

APA – American Psychiatric Association

SAMHSA – Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration website, with resources for help with substance abuse

NGC – National Guideline Clearinghouse. A database of evidence-based clinical practice guidelines.

WebMD – Web MD

CHADD – Children and Adults with Attention Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder

ADDA – Attention Deficit Disorder Association

DBSA – Obsessive-Compulsive Foundation. Resources for Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder (OCD).

ImPACT – Immediate Post-Concussion Assessment and Cognitive Testing

Child & Adolescent Bipolar Foundation – CABF improves the lives of families raising children and teens living with bipolar disorder and related conditions.
